Html:
Hi,

Is it currently possible (or is it planned) that the tyepscript compiler can be configured to preserve the new lines in the input TS?

I am trying to create a sample that both TS and javascript users can read and use to understand how a library works. However, the javascript code is missing the newlines from the original TS making the code less user friendly (it is still readable just a bit confusing in places).

Thanks
Yes, we are aware of issues with whitespace preservation. We are working on fixing those, but may not get to all instances before the next release.
